explains: n. 慢跑者；[印刷] 撞纸机

sentences.en: The difference between a jogger and a runner is an entry blank.
sentences.cn: 慢跑者和跑步者的不同是一张报名表。

sentences.en: One day he jogged into the park and another jogger knocked into him.
sentences.cn: 一天他慢跑进公园和另一个慢跑撞到他。

sentences.en: Ireland looks like an abstemious jogger that has suffered a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰看起来像是一个有节制的慢跑者犯了场心脏病。
